title: Incompatible Applications and other frivolous questions. (Prynce-senpai told me to come here) :D
body:
So, it seems it's not just me who's been having this problem, but many of us do... On the site it said.

> "Note: The app works with devices using iOS 8.3 or newer or Android 4.1.1 or newer (API 16)." - http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/download-free-league-friends-mobile-app

But on the image below I actually have a Galaxy SIII LTE running with Android KitKat 4.1.1 but nevertheless still incompatible, now my question is pretty much everyone's question too... Why does it say incompatible when I'm already running the required version of the Operating System?

[Herp_Derp.jpg](https://scontent.fceb2-1.fna.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xtf1/v/wl/t35.0-12/12837159_10209179757679583_1893245207_o.jpg?oh=fc18bc4dcb1ed12bc3194fb2048e6cb6&oe=56E4570A)[HerpDerp.jpg](https://p2.zdusercontent.com/attachment/43400/aCvsRSoM7AuWGzZWZnGZvkw0d?token=eyJhbGciOiJkaXIiLCJlbmMiOiJBMTI4Q0JDLUhTMjU2In0..Z2qR_fvIxlQ6des0ALL5cg.eFLUsyAL25RTLsgQz_Ho1jAHQWTl-Z3Z1yfgD4Jylrb08nz4bnKUH3PKs3qP9rBZHvwU_peh_Kg2zBkb5U7DkykFGElc_DgJHLHs9STwE-k7mcUuhw57LmFfPkSUn61cCKs6SZjRPkQMLXwzv0zg5lVvv8kyviS5kaYm0mylJb8xhGHSduZBhsKCmc9raHwiTjm2EpGCllU91iGfid88-8JQGlsGXpv1RQLaSQO9vOYyn1WVDv1DyqgYFng1QH0Ox_EgqtGvh-InMe70IFPFTg.0no2K5boEQTusPcFSDLEug)

[Even_More_Derp.jpg](https://p2.zdusercontent.com/attachment/43400/aCvsRSoM7AuWGzZWZnGZvkw0d?token=eyJhbGciOiJkaXIiLCJlbmMiOiJBMTI4Q0JDLUhTMjU2In0..Z2qR_fvIxlQ6des0ALL5cg.eFLUsyAL25RTLsgQz_Ho1jAHQWTl-Z3Z1yfgD4Jylrb08nz4bnKUH3PKs3qP9rBZHvwU_peh_Kg2zBkb5U7DkykFGElc_DgJHLHs9STwE-k7mcUuhw57LmFfPkSUn61cCKs6SZjRPkQMLXwzv0zg5lVvv8kyviS5kaYm0mylJb8xhGHSduZBhsKCmc9raHwiTjm2EpGCllU91iGfid88-8JQGlsGXpv1RQLaSQO9vOYyn1WVDv1DyqgYFng1QH0Ox_EgqtGvh-InMe70IFPFTg.0no2K5boEQTusPcFSDLEug)

**Please notice me ~~Rito~~ Riot - senpai's** 
:3 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Update: EUNE is up and running! 

http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/download-free-league-friends-mobile-app

HELLO THIS IS DOG (Riot). :P

Little more info needed on my end to diagnose this:

What country are you in right now? 
Which Play Store/link are you trying to download the app from?

Uhm, well I'm playing from all the way in the Philippines, so I guess it wouldn't be available as of now here...
Will it be available worldwide at some point Sir Rito Sparkle-senpai? :3 :D

My mobile is 4.2.2 S dous 2 
and i cant download the app

> [{quoted}](name=XinSAneXwings,realm=EUNE,application-id=J7eFAjsN,discussion-id=t59yFHUA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-11T08:15:23.433+0000)
>
> My mobile is 4.2.2 S dous 2 
> and i cant download the app

If you're EUNE you won't be able to download the app until we release in Europe (in the next couple of weeks!). Right now the app is only released in Latin America, Oceania and North America.
